titles.title: Recognizing 75 Texas World War II veterans visiting Washington, D.C., on September 27, 2010, to visit the memorials built in their honor.
Recognizing 75 Texas World War II veterans visiting Washington, D.C., on September 27, 2010, to visit the memorials built in their honor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Honors the 75 World War II veterans visiting Washington, D.C., from Texas on September 27, 2010, for their service and dedication, and wishes them a memorable visit to Washington.
